languages.text: {n}Уголки рта Соломона чуть поднимаются.{/n} "Если вы имеете ввиду, что я показал себя растяпой — то полностью согласен. И рад, что извлеку этот урок из события, которое не повлекло трагедии".

{n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."
languages.original_text: {n}Уголки рта Соломона чуть поднимаются.{/n} "Если вы имеете ввиду, что я показал себя растяпой — то полностью согласен. И рад, что извлеку этот урок из события, которое не повлекло трагедии".

traits.locale_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent idiot — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかにほころんだ。{/n}「もし、私が無能に見えたと言いたいのなら、まったくその通りです。それに、この教訓を悲劇に終わらない出来事から得たことを嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの口元がわずかにほころんだ。{/n}「もし、私が無能に見えたと言いたいのなら、まったくその通りです。それに、この教訓を悲劇に終わらない出来事から得たことを嬉しく思います」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Mundwinkel heben sich leicht.{/n} "Wenn Ihr meint, dass ich mich selbst als inkompetent dargestellt habe – muss ich Euch vollständig zustimmen. Und ich bin froh, dass ich diese Lektion bei einem Vorfall lernen durfte, der nicht in einer Tragödie endete."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Mundwinkel heben sich leicht.{/n} "Wenn Ihr meint, dass ich mich selbst als inkompetent dargestellt habe – muss ich Euch vollständig zustimmen. Und ich bin froh, dass ich diese Lektion bei einem Vorfall lernen durfte, der nicht in einer Tragödie endete."

languages.text: {n}Les commissures des lèvres de Solomorne se retroussent légèrement.{/n} « Si vous entendez par là que je me suis conduit comme un incapable, je suis tout à fait d'accord avec vous. Et je me félicite d'avoir appris cette leçon dans le cadre d'un incident mineur qui n'a pas tourné à la tragédie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les commissures des lèvres de Solomorne se retroussent légèrement.{/n} « Si vous entendez par là que je me suis conduit comme un incapable, je suis tout à fait d'accord avec vous. Et je me félicite d'avoir appris cette leçon dans le cadre d'un incident mineur qui n'a pas tourné à la tragédie. »

languages.text: {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Solomorne se crispan ligeramente.{/n} «Si se refiere a que he quedado como un incompetente, estoy de acuerdo. Y me alegro de haber aprendido la lección sin que haya ocurrido una tragedia».
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las comisuras de los labios de Solomorne se crispan ligeramente.{/n} «Si se refiere a que he quedado como un incompetente, estoy de acuerdo. Y me alegro de haber aprendido la lección sin que haya ocurrido una tragedia».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙微微扬起了嘴角。{/n}“如果你的意思是：我的错误让我看起来像个废物一样，那我完全同意你的看法。我很高兴，能从这场有惊无险的事故中学到重要的教训。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙微微扬起了嘴角。{/n}“如果你的意思是：我的错误让我看起来像个废物一样，那我完全同意你的看法。我很高兴，能从这场有惊无险的事故中学到重要的教训。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un dudağının kenarı hafifçe kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Beceriksizlik ettiğimi kastediyorsanız haklısınız. Neyse ki felaketle neticelenmeyen bir hadiseden dersimi almış oldum."
languages.original_text: {n}The corners of Solomorne's mouth lift slightly.{/n} "If you mean that I made myself look like an incompetent — then I completely agree. And I'm glad I was taught this lesson from an event that didn't end in tragedy."
